tool_description: A bitcoin ticker that provides the Coinapult Index Price and more.
name: Coinapult Ticker
title: Coinapult Ticker

api_list.name: ticker

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: Specify one of USD_BTC, EUR_BTC, GBP_BTC, XAG_BTC, XAU_BTC

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Restrict the levels returned by the ticker. Example: 100,small
